SEARCH

Uses of Package
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable

Packages that use nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api
This package contains various APIs used throughout the project, including definitions for animated blocks, colors, debugging, factories, glowing block spawners, the platform interface, and more.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable
Contains classes and interfaces used to easily restart objects.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.audio
This package contains the audio system used in this project, including audio animation hooks, audio set configurations, audio descriptions, and audio players.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.extensions
Contains classes for loading structure types from external sources.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.localization
Contains classes for localizing text in the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.managers
This package contains managers that manage different certain aspects of the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.moveblocks
This package contains the core logic for animating structures..
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.comands
This package contains classes responsible for handling commands.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.compatiblity
This package contains classes responsible for providing compatibility with various third-party plugins.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.config
This package contains classes responsible for handling the configuration files used by the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.listeners
This package contains all classes for event listeners for various types of events for the BigDoors plugin for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.managers
Contains classes that manage various aspects of the plugin specifically for the Spigot platform, such as redstone management and vault economy integration.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util.implementations
Provides implementations of BigDoors core interfaces that can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
  • Classes in nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable used by nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api
    Class
    Description
    IRestartable
    Represents an object what can be restarted and shut down.
  • Classes in nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable used by nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable
    Class
    Description
    IRestartable
    Represents an object what can be restarted and shut down.
    RestartableHolder
    Represents an object that can issue a restart or shutdown to IRestartable objects.
